note.p: Death: The house of his brother Henry, a linen draper, in the Haymarket, Westminster (17 November 1680)
Burial: The chancel of Waterstock church, Oxfordshire
Education: St Paul's School, London; All Souls' College, Oxford; MA (1652); Middle Temple (admitted 1649)
Career: Fellow of All Souls', Oxford (1648); High Sheriff of Oxfordshire (1664); Gresham Professor of Rhetoric; the first person to bring the plane tree to England
Sources: Bulloch's Roll; St Paul's; Ward; Foster; MT
